name: Fragile Masculinity
description:
Get ready to face off against the three biggest "alpha males" in town in this bullet hell game about fragile masculinity! First up is "Bricked-up Bob", the brick-layer with biceps the size of bowling balls and an ego to match. He's built like a tank and just as tough to take down.

Next is "Fratbro Fred", the stereotypical frat boy who's never heard the word "no" and thinks consent is something you get from a lawyer. He's got a trust fund, a keg of beer, and an endless supply of slurs to hurl your way.

And finally, there's "Emotionally Unavailable Dad", the guy who thinks vulnerability is a weakness and showing emotions is for wimps. He's as cold as a frozen burrito and about as affectionate as a cactus.

Each boss fight is a chaotic, bullet-filled frenzy as you dodge, weave, and shoot your way through their attacks. But don't worry, you're not unarmed – you've got an arsenal of slurs at your disposal, from "Get a life!" to "Call mom already!".

So get ready to take on these three caricatures of toxic masculinity, and maybe learn a thing or two about what not to do in the process. Because if there's one thing tougher than taking down these bosses, it's confronting your own issues and working to be a better person. Or you could just keep shooting at them. Your call.

Discord

If you want to talk about the game or just want to follow us as developers, feel free to join our discord. We're happy to talk to you!
